com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack
Class PeriodicJob

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.PositionUpdateJob
      com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.PeriodicJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.Serialisable
public class PeriodicJob
extends PositionUpdateJob

This class represents a periodic update strategy for position information. Each time the time period elapses, a PositionUpdate is generated.
